onset.Description: Time of the stimulus onset in seconds relative to the beginning of the experiment t=0.

duration.Description: Duration of the stimulus presentation in seconds.

trial_type.Description: The condition of the stimulus being presented in a given block

Levels.original: Point light figures (PLF) of single person actions
Levels.scrambled: PLFs with the trajectories of the given point intact but the spatial position of the points are shuffled relative to each other
Levels.static: A single frame of the orginal PLFs without motion
Levels.translation: Stimulus of dots translating across the screen with blinking
